text: I think Victoria the two reasons here
one is that the invasion of Iraq led to

destruction of the bath party which was

suddenly had a whole bunch of highly
disaffected Sunni Muslims many of them
with training in the use of weapons and
in military strategy who have eventually
have found their way to Isis that's
point number one point number two this
is extremely important is that one of
the unintended consequences of the
invasion of Iraq was actually to hand
Iraq to the Iranian sphere of influence
and of course Iran is the leading Shia
Muslim state in the Middle East and what
we're witnessing now in the Middle East
with Isis apart from anything else is a

of Islam and the Sunni sect of Islam is
like Protestants and Catholics in Europe
in the 17th century
so is it down then to moderate Sunni
